Layer.InitCommand: %function(self) samTheme_comboTextP1 = self; self:zoom(0.15) self:x(-SCREEN_CENTER_X + 3) self:y((6*(SCREEN_HEIGHT/8)) + 70) self:horizalign('left') end

%function(self) self:zoom(0.25) self:diffuse(1, 1, 1, 1) -- white samTheme_ingameMAXCP1 = self; samTheme_MaxComboP1 = 0; self:luaeffect('Update') self:horizalign('left') self:y((6*(SCREEN_HEIGHT/8)) + 70 - 15) self:x(-SCREEN_CENTER_X + 2) end
Layer.UpdateCommand: %function(self) if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('ScoreP1') and samTheme_p1MaxCombo then local stagestats = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0) local combo = stagestats:GetCurrentCombo() if combo > samTheme_MaxComboP1 then samTheme_MaxComboP1 = stagestats:GetCurrentCombo() end self:settext(samTheme_MaxComboP1) else self:hidden(1) samTheme_comboTextP1:hidden(1) end end
